mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM relevance AS t0 INNER JOIN org AS t1 ON t0.SecondId = t1.Id WHERE (t0.FirstId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER }) AND ('t1.Key' = 'UserOrg')

,

,

#{item}
order by Id

SELECT
,
FROM org order by SortNo
mapper.delete: delete from org where CascadeId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cascadeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

update org
CascadeId = #{cascadeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HotKey = #{hotkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ParentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ParentName = #{parentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsLeaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=BIT},
IsAutoExpand = #{isautoexpand,jdbcType=BIT},
IconName = #{iconname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BizCode = #{bizcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateId = #{createid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SortNo = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CustomCode = #{customcode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
